MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L13, L7 and L6 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:42am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Fairfield Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:46am on 17th January.
